title: Compass Pathways CEO on 'Magic Mushrooms'
itunes:title: Compass Pathways CEO on 'Magic Mushrooms'
description:
Dr. David Levy, CEO of EHE Health, discusses what he is seeing with the coronavirus in NYC and his thoughts on a potential vaccine. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Venture Capital Reporter Sarah McBride talk about the story “Iconic Boston Dynamics Robots Seek Stable Employment.” Compass Pathways CEO George Goldsmith shares details on a ‘magic mushroom’ company going mainstream. And we Drive to the Close with Ann Miletti, Head of Active Equity at Wells Fargo Asset Management.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
